channel.title: Arrange blocks grouped by Markdown heading levels
channel.description:
### Arrange blocks grouped by Markdown heading levels
[Arrange Markdown Blocks | Drafts Action Directory](https://actions.getdrafts.com/a/15K)
- Set grouping level according to MD ‘## heading levels‘ - Uses the Arrange Mode dialog with selected text or whole draft if no selection. - Make sure to use Arrange in ‘Block’ mode! - Overwrites the selected text with the results from this dialog, if any changes. - Loops for easy change of level if Arrange is canceled or unchanged.
